---
title: "Cold War Turns Hot"
---

The Cuban Missile Crisis has escalated into full-fledged thermonuclear war.

* All Dove types earn zero payoffs.
* Any Madmen types earn a payoff of 3.

Record your strategies and payoffs.

  * Khrushchev player may optionally reveal their hidden type.

  * Discuss each of your strategies in the game.
  Make sure you get your classmate's actual name.

  * If necessary, update your priors and/or revise your plan of action.

  * Then find a new opponent and play the game again.
